author: Adam Ennis
description: Rich, pungent and not too sweet.
name: Zeus Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Chilled water (reduce if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR fernet into chilled/frozen glass, swirl round to coat inside and DISCARD excess
MUDDLE raisins with cognac in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into fernet-rinsed glass
